title: Where Can I Learn More About Figma Variables
content: Where can I learn more about Figma Variables? - The Design System Guide Close Figma Variables # Where can I learn more about Figma Variables? Romina Kavcic Intro to variables Playground File In this tutorial, learn how to use variables to help you design faster, use aliasing to implement design tokens, and account for different product themes. üîó Get the Figma template file [https://www.figma.com/community/file/1253086684245880517] Use this file to follow along our Intro to variables [https://youtu.be/1ONxxlJnvdM] and Prototype with variables [https://youtu.be/VEuwKJAz7Jg] video tutorials. Optimising your design system with Figma‚Äôs variables [https://uxdesign.cc/design-system-figma-variables-f3d9c4351bcc] Diving into primitive & semantic. Figma Variables at Vodafone UK: how we structured taxonomy for a complex multi-brand design system [https://medium.com/vodafone-uk-design-experience/figma-variables-at-vodafone-uk-how-we-structured-taxonomy-for-a-complex-multi-brand-design-system-693b1b95675f] When we started working on this project leading up to the Variables launch at Config 2023, we came across lots of insightful information albeit no ready-made solution for our use case, nor the discovery process that led to other frameworks‚Äô informed decisions. Therefore, we hope documenting our journey may provide some inspiration for anyone else starting to apply Variables to their design system. Design tokens (variables) architecture in Tetrisly Design System. Part 1: Introduction [https://medium.com/design-bootcamp/design-tokens-variables-architecture-in-tetrisly-design-system-part-1-introduction-9cee27e45d6c] The way how we addressed design token challenges, from Figma limitations to building a scalable taxonomy. Tokens vs Variables in Tokens Studio for Figma | Variables Series by Samantha Gordashko üìπ Watch the video [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AtMVxP0UMII&t=2s ] Tokens, variables, and styles üìπ Watch the video [https://Tokens, variables, and styles - Update: Introduction to design systems] Next question How to import or export Figma Variables with plugin?
